N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 406.1 - Definition

State Regulations

For purposes of this section, a swing bed program
operated by a rural hospital that has an approval from the Health Care

Financing Administration (HCFA) to provide posthospital skilled nursing faciity
(SNF) care shall mean beds used interchangeably as either general hospital or
nursing home beds with reimbursement based on the specific type of care
provided so that use of beds in this manner provides small hospitals with
greater flexibility in meeting fluctuating demands for inpatient general
hospital and nursing home care. Notes
